channel.title: Need help on setting up cache on Vengeance-X PVP!
channel.description: need help please!! i set the signlink.java to my :c/ drive. and i dragged the cache in there, and source runs and all, but when i run client it just says connection erro retying again. over and over. please somebody help me please!!!!!
